short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find the leading products of each category in Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes Amazon shopping much easier by listing a product rank within the different categories and the top products within that category right where you need it.
